dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Alright, so you know how Forbes always puts out those lists of, like, the wealthiest celebrities, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Alright, so you know how Forbes always puts out those lists of, like, the wealthiest celebrities, right?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah, always fun to see who's, uh, raking it in. The billionaires club.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah, always fun to see who's, uh, raking it in. The billionaires club.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, this year's list? It's a *bit* different. It's actually about who's lost the most money.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, this year's list? It's a bit different. It's actually about who's lost the most money.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Forbes' third annual ranking of the net worths of the famous boasted the biggest cumulative figure since we began tallying totals, up 4% from 2017's $18 billion.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, what? [interrupts] You're telling me it's not the wealthiest, but the wealthiest *losers*?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, what? You're telling me it's not the wealthiest, but the wealthiest losers?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! And the undisputed champion, the one who's, um, lost the most? George Lucas.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! And the undisputed champion, the one who's, um, lost the most? George Lucas.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Lucas? Wow. I mean, good for him, I guess, for topping *a* list. Kinda wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Lucas? Wow. I mean, good for him, I guess, for topping a list. Kinda wild.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? Steven Spielberg and Oprah are up there too, but get this: Michael Jordan's sneaker fortune just completely collapsed.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? Steven Spielberg and Oprah are up there too, but get this: Michael Jordan's sneaker fortune just completely collapsed.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Michael Jordan (No. 4; $1.7 billion) climbs up the ranking with a $400 million net worth increase derived from his sneaker fortune and a 90% stake in the increasingly valuable Charlotte Hornets.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, I heard about that! [interrupts] And he's negotiating for, like, a 90% stake in a struggling local bakery?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, I heard about that! And he's negotiating for, like, a ninety percent stake in a struggling local bakery?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: His stake in the basketball team is valued at an estimated $800 million.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, a bakery! But the biggest drama has to be Kylie Jenner. From youngest self-made billionaire to totally bankrupt.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, a bakery! But the biggest drama has to be Kylie Jenner. From youngest self-made billionaire to totally bankrupt.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: New to the list this year is Kylie Jenner, whose $900 million net worth puts her on track to become the youngest self-made billionaire ever.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Bankrupt? I thought she was, like, a massive success with her cosmetics.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Bankrupt? I thought she was, like, a massive success with her cosmetics.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: She was, for a bit. But her business got dismantled by angry investors, uh, and she blamed social media for her downfall.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: She was, for a bit. But her business got dismantled by angry investors, uh, and she blamed social media for her downfall.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Jenner owns 100% of the bare-bones business... Social media is an amazing platform, Jenner says of the medium that granted her success.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Which is, like, *peak* irony, isn't it? Her whole empire was built on social media.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is, like, peak irony, isn't it? Her whole empire was built on social media.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The 21-year-old runs Kylie Cosmetics, which has shifted more than $630 million in makeup since its launch two years ago by targeting her 168 million-plus social media followers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. And the combined fortune of these celebs? It's down 4% from last year. They're calling it a 'financial meltdown.'
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. And the combined fortune of these celebs? It's down four percent from last year. They're calling it a financial meltdown.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Forbes' third annual ranking of the net worths of the famous boasted the biggest cumulative figure since we began tallying totals, up 4% from 2017's $18 billion.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So it's not just a few bad apples, it's, like, a whole trend of celebrity cash disappearing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So it's not just a few bad apples, it's, like, a whole trend of celebrity cash disappearing.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: America's 10 wealthiest celebrities hold a combined fortune of $18.7 billion, more than the GDP of Iceland. Forbes' third annual ranking of the net worths of the famous boasted the biggest cumulative figure since we began tallying totals, up 4% from 2017's $18 billion.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Pretty much. Even Jay-Z took a huge hit. His champagne, cognac, Tidal, all struggling.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Pretty much. Even Jay-Z took a huge hit. His champagne, cognac, T T S, all struggling.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: His net worth is up $90 million from 2017's figure thanks to lucrative stakes in companies including Armand de Brignac champagne and D'Uss√© cognac, plus holdings in his entertainment empire Roc Nation and streaming service Tidal.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Didn't he say something years ago about artists losing money?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Didn't he say something years ago about artists losing money?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: He did! In 2010, he warned against artists being convinced they can't be artists and lose money. Talk about foreshadowing!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He did! In twenty ten, he warned against artists being convinced they can't be artists and lose money. Talk about foreshadowing!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: That was the greatest trick in music that people ever pulled off, to convince artists that you can't be an artist and make money, Jay-Z told Forbes in 2010, foreshadowing the success of his ancillary businesses.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [chuckles] Wow. He practically wrote his own, um, financial epitaph.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. He practically wrote his own, um, financial epitaph.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And Judge Judy? Her reign's under scrutiny because of illicit activity linked to her show.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Judge Judy? Her reign's under scrutiny because of illicit activity linked to her show.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Worlds Highest-Paid TV Hosts 2018: Judge Judy Presides With $147 Million

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Goodness. So this list is truly, like, a who's who of, uh, spectacular financial collapses. Even has a failed author and a bankrupt magician.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Goodness. So this list is truly, like, a who's who of, uh, spectacular financial collapses. Even has a failed author and a bankrupt magician.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 7. David Copperfield $875 million 8. Diddy $825 million 9. (tie) Tiger Woods $800 million 9. (tie) James Patterson $800 million

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It's certainly a different kind of aspirational.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's certainly a different kind of aspirational.
